    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94738</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Telephone wires during hot and cold days</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Telefonleitungen während der heißen und kalten 
Tage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fils de téléphone pendant des jours chauds et 
froids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fios do telefone durante dias quentes e frios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legare del telefono durante i giorni caldi e 
freddi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τηλεφωνικά καλώδια κατά τη διάρκεια των καυτών και 
κρύων ημερών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alambres del teléfono durante días calientes y 
fríos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that telephone wires expand and go slack during hot days (A) and contract and go tight during cold days (B).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">contraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Telephone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Telefonleitungen fest
während kalter Tage (b) erweitern und gehen Durchhang während 
heißer Tage (a) und des Vertrages und gehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les fils de 
téléphone augmentent et vont mou pendant les jours chauds (a) et le 
contrat et vont fortement pendant les jours froids (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os fios do telefone 
expandem e vão folga durante os dias quentes (A) e o contrato e vão 
firmemente durante os dias frios (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i legare del 
telefono si espandono e vanno allentamento durante i giorni caldi (A) 
ed il contratto e vanno fortemente durante i giorni freddi (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα τηλεφωνικά καλώδια 
επεκτείνονται και πηγαίνουν νωθρά κατά τη διάρκεια των καυτών 
ημερών (A) και της σύμβασης και πηγαίνουν σφιχτά κατά τη 
διάρκεια των κρύων ημερών (B).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los alambres del 
teléfono se amplían y van holgura durante los días calientes (a) y 
contrato y van firmemente durante los días fríos (b).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kalt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kontraktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
